alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 02 at 1:57PM CST until January 02 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Houston County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 300 PM CST. * At 157 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dothan to near Graceville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Dothan, Taylor, Ashford, Cowarts, Webb, Columbia, Kinsey, Rehobeth, Avon, Madrid, Gordon, Memphis, Pansey, Crosby, Grangeburg, Garretts Crossroads, Sigma, Enon and Wilson Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for southeastern Alabama...the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
